body.p:
You can use the Index Terms action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Content generation category to ask the AI Positron to create and insert index term elements in a DITA topic's prolog based on the selected content.

An Index Terms AI action is incredibly useful to end users as it simplifies the process of organizing and categorizing large amounts of information. By automatically generating index terms for documents, this AI action saves users valuable time and effort that would otherwise be spent manually identifying and labeling relevant terms. The AI analyzes the content, identifies key concepts, and generates a comprehensive list of index terms that accurately represent the content's main ideas.
Open the topic and invoke the Short Description action.
